Our Services

Investment

We offer funding and partner with potential start-ups across Malawi. We bridge the gap between potential businesses and investors.

Rent to Own

We offer assets to talented and skilled young entrepreneurs on rent until they grow and buy their own.

Loans

These loans are backed by collateral, giving borrowers the confidence to pursue their ventures.

Business Training

Entrepreneurs are oriented on various aspects of entrepreneurship including pitching, business analysis, leadership and management.

Marketing and Advertisement

Through our networks, we help Promote and Market the products, services as well as skills of the entrepreneurs.

Why Choose Us?

At The Pangolins, we are more than just a funding organization. We are passionate about empowering young entrepreneurs in Malawi and bridging the gap between investors and emerging businesses. Our commitment to transparency, personalized financial solutions, and experienced guidance sets us apart. With our secure loan options, business training, and ongoing support, we aim to be your reliable partner in your entrepreneurial journey. Choose The Pangolins and let's grow together.

Secure and Transparent

The Pangolins prioritize security and transparency in all our services. Our loan options are designed to be secure for both borrowers and investors, ensuring a trustworthy partnership.

Experienced Team

Our team consists of experienced professionals who are dedicated to supporting and guiding entrepreneurs throughout their journey. We provide personalized assistance to ensure your success.

Tailored Solutions

We understand that each business is unique. That's why we offer tailored financial solutions that align with your specific needs and goals, providing the best support for your venture.

Empowering Entrepreneurs

At The Pangolins, we are committed to empowering entrepreneurs with the resources and knowledge they need to succeed. We provide business training and ongoing support to help you thrive in your journey.

FAQ

The Pangolins' Investment Program aims to provide funding and partner with potential start-ups across Malawi. We bridge the gap between potential businesses and investors, fostering entrepreneurship and economic growth.

The Pangolins offers secured loans to innovative young entrepreneurs in Malawi at a reasonable rate. These loans require collateral, providing a more secure lending option for businesses.

The Pangolins offers unsecured loans to talented and skilled young entrepreneurs in Malawi. No collateral is required, making it a suitable financing option for businesses with innovative ideas.

The Pangolins' Rent to Own Program offers assets to talented and skilled young entrepreneurs on rent. This program enables entrepreneurs to access essential resources until they grow and are able to purchase the assets for their own use.

The Pangolins provides comprehensive business training during the provision of our services. Entrepreneurs receive orientation on various aspects of entrepreneurship, including pitching, business analysis tools, as well as leadership and management of their organizations.

Through our platform, The Pangolins promotes and sells the products and skills of the entrepreneurs. We help them reach a wider audience and boost their visibility in the market, enhancing their chances of success.
